entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS AROUND 20

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY

MOSTLY CLOUDY

HIGHS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
